title: Gold support main learning ADC looking for support xD
body: Last 2 seasons with support I've been Gold 4 and Gold 3, this season I got placed in silver and supporting my way out just isn't working for me so I'm picking up adc, I need someone patient to support me, and then maybe hit up ranked together. ^.^

replies.body: yeah I will play with yah, my in game name is yakuno
